text: “Kapena inu (Ayuda ndi Akhrisitu) mudalipo pamene Ya’qub idamdzera imfa, pamene adati kwa ana ake: “Kodi pambuyo panga mudzapembedza yani?” Iwo adayankha nati: “Tidzapembedza Mulungu wako, Mulungu wa makolo ako; Ibrahim, Ismail ndi Ishâq; Mulungu mmodzi basi. Ndipo ife kwa Iye tili Asilamu (ogonjera).”
